name: Google Calendar Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Calendar Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Calendar API

preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleCalendar.displayName: Interact with your Google Calendar using our pre-built
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleCalendar.name: preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleCalendar
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleCalendar.natural_language_description: 参数名: Interact with your Google Calendar using our pre-built

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google Calendar API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: event
available_options: Calendar (值: calendar)
Event (值: event)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Add a event to calendar
Delete (值: delete) - Delete an event
Get (值: get) - Retrieve an event
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many events from a calendar
Update (值: update) - Update an event
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

calendar.name: calendar
calendar.natural_language_description: 参数名: Calendar | 作用: Google Calendar to operate on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

timeMin.name: timeMin
timeMin.description: At least some part of the event must be after this time, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget
timeMin.natural_language_description: 参数名: After | 作用: At least some part of the event must be after this time, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget | 默认值: ={{ $now }}

timeMax.name: timeMax
timeMax.description: At least some part of the event must be before this time, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget
timeMax.natural_language_description: 参数名: Before | 作用: At least some part of the event must be before this time, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget | 默认值: ={{ $now.plus({ week: 1 }) }}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: timeMin (值: None) - At least some part of the event must be after this time, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget
timeMax (值: None) - At least some part of the event must be before this time, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget
singleEvents (值: None) - Whether to expand recurring events into instances and only return single one-off events and instances of recurring events, but not the underlying recurring events themselves
fields (值: None) - Specify fields to return, by default a predefined by Google set of commonly used fields would be returned. To return all fields, use '*', More info.
iCalUID (值: None) - Specifies event ID in the iCalendar format to be included in the response
maxAttendees (值: None) - The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.
orderBy (值: None) - The order of the events returned in the result
query (值: None) - Free text search terms to find events that match these terms in any field, except for extended properties
recurringEventHandling (值: None)
showDeleted (值: None) - Whether to include deleted events (with status equals "cancelled") in the result
showHiddenInvitations (值: None) - Whether to include hidden invitations in the result
timeZone (值: None) - Time zone used in the response. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

updatedMin (值: None) - Lower bound for an event's last modification time (as a RFC3339 timestamp) to filter by. When specified, entries deleted since this time will always be included regardless of showDeleted.

start.name: start
start.description: Start time of the event, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget
start.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start | 作用: Start time of the event, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget | 默认值: ={{ $now }} | (必填项)

end.name: end
end.description: End time of the event, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget
end.natural_language_description: 参数名: End | 作用: End time of the event, use expression to set a date, or switch to fixed mode to choose date from widget | 默认值: ={{ $now.plus(1, 'hour') }} | (必填项)

useDefaultReminders.name: useDefaultReminders
useDefaultReminders.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Default Reminders | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: allday (值: None) - Whether the event is all day or not
attendees (值: None) - The attendees of the event. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
color (值: None) - The color of the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
conferenceDataUi (值: None) - Creates a conference link (Hangouts, Meet etc) and attaches it to the event
description (值: None)
guestsCanInviteOthers (值: None) - Whether attendees other than the organizer can invite others to the event
guestsCanModify (值: None) - Whether attendees other than the organizer can modify the event
guestsCanSeeOtherGuests (值: None) - Whether attendees other than the organizer can see who the event's attendees are
id (值: None) - Opaque identifier of the event
location (值: None) - Geographic location of the event as free-form text
maxAttendees (值: None) - The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.
repeatFrecuency (值: None)
repeatHowManyTimes (值: None)
repeatUntil (值: None)
rrule (值: None) - Recurrence rule. When set, the parameters Repeat Frequency, Repeat How Many Times and Repeat Until are ignored.
sendUpdates (值: None) - Whether to send notifications about the creation of the new event
showMeAs (值: None) - Whether the event blocks time on the calendar
summary (值: None) - Title of the event
visibility (值: None) - Visibility of the event

remindersUi.name: remindersUi
remindersUi.description: If the event doesn't use the default reminders, this lists the reminders specific to the event
remindersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reminders | 作用: If the event doesn't use the default reminders, this lists the reminders specific to the event | 默认值: {}
available_options: remindersValues (值: None)

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

modifyTarget.name: modifyTarget
modifyTarget.natural_language_description: 参数名: Modify | 默认值: instance
available_options: Recurring Event Instance (值: instance)
Recurring Event (值: event)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: allday (值: None) - Whether the event is all day or not
attendeesUi (值: None)
attendees (值: None) - The attendees of the event. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
color (值: None) - The color of the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
description (值: None)
end (值: None) - End time of the event
guestsCanInviteOthers (值: None) - Whether attendees other than the organizer can invite others to the event
guestsCanModify (值: None) - Whether attendees other than the organizer can modify the event
guestsCanSeeOtherGuests (值: None) - Whether attendees other than the organizer can see who the event's attendees are
id (值: None) - Opaque identifier of the event
location (值: None) - Geographic location of the event as free-form text
maxAttendees (值: None) - The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.
repeatFrecuency (值: None)
repeatHowManyTimes (值: None)
repeatUntil (值: None)
rrule (值: None) - Recurrence rule. When set, the parameters Repeat Frequency, Repeat How Many Times and Repeat Until are ignored.
sendUpdates (值: None) - Whether to send notifications about the creation of the new event
showMeAs (值: None) - Whether the event blocks time on the calendar
start (值: None) - Start time of the event
summary (值: None) - Title of the event
visibility (值: None) - Visibility of the event

useN8nTimeZone.displayName: This node will use the time zone set in n8n’s settings, but you can override this in the workflow settings
useN8nTimeZone.name: useN8nTimeZone
useN8nTimeZone.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node will use the time zone set in n8n’s settings, but you can override this in the workflow settings
